title: Bug 16822: Search results not removed when 'cu' is moved
OB: When X.java is moved to 'P/src2', the search result remains in the search view. A double-click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog with the message: 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.'
EB: After moving X.java to 'P/src2', the search results should be automatically removed from the search view to avoid confusion and prevent 'Search Error' dialogs from appearing when double-clicking on the search result.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Move X.java to 'P/src2'.
2. Open the search view.
3. Perform a search that includes X.java.
4. Observe that the search result for X.java is still present in the search view.
5. Double-click on the search result and note the appearance of the 'Search Error' dialog with the message 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.'
